post.summary: Create a new user
post.description: Creates a new user with the provided information

get.summary: Fetches a user by the given ID
get.description: Finds the user with the given ID in the database

200.description: Successfull fetch of a user from the databse

404.description: There does not exist any user in the database such that the given id matches their id

patch.summary: Updates a user by the given ID
patch.description: Updates the user with the given ID in the database

get.summary: Fetches a user's associated company by the given user ID
get.description: Finds the user's company with the given user's ID in the database

200.description: Successfull fetch of a user's company from the database

404.description: There does not exist any user in the database such that the given id matches their id OR there is no such user with the given ID that has a non-null company

post.summary: Create a new company
post.description: Creates a new company using a company name and optional Quickbooks import time

404.description: Company not found

get.summary: Gets a company from the database
get.description: Gets a company using the company ID

404.description: Company not found

patch.description: Updates a company's information by ID
Updates the lastQuickBooksInvoiceImportTime for a company by ID
Updates the lastQuickBooksPurcahseImportTime for a company by ID

get.summary: Gets a company's location from the database
get.description: Gets a company's locations using the company ID

get.summary: Get a company's claim in progress, if one exists
get.description: Gets the company's current claim in progress. Companies can only have up to one claim in progress at a time.

get.summary: Check if a company has data (either connected to quickbooks or has purchase/invoice data)
get.description: Gets the company's data if it is present.

400.description: Get Company Data in Progress Errors

500.description: Get Company Data in Progress Errors

post.summary: Create a new disaster
post.description: Creates a new disaster with the provided information

get.summary: Get all disasters
get.description: Gets all disasters stored in the database

post.summary: Create an address for some location of a company
post.description: Creates a new location address with the provided information

patch.description: Updates the location address information for the location with the given id

get.summary: Gets an address for some location of a company
get.description: Creates a new location address with the provided information

200.description: The associated location address for the given information

404.description: The given UUID does not have an associated location address in the database

delete.description: Removes the location address with the provided id

400.description: Invalid location ID or no Company with that ID

post.summary: Create many addresses for locations of a company
post.description: Creates new location addresses with the provided information

patch.summary: Update the given array of locations
patch.description: Updates the location address information for each of the given locations based on their id

get.summary: Get user notifications
get.description: Retrieves all disaster notifications for a specific user with optional filtering and pagination

400.description: Invalid user ID format or query parameters

404.description: User not found or no notifications found

patch.description: Marks a specific notification as read and updates readAt timestamp

404.description: Notification not found

patch.description: Marks a specific notification as unread and clears the readAt timestamp

404.description: Notification not found

post.summary: Bulk create notifications
post.description: Creates multiple disaster notifications at once for impacted users

201.description: Notifications successfully created with createdAt timestamps

400.description: Invalid request payload or UUID format

404.description: User or FEMA Disaster not found
Notification not found

patch.description: Marks all unread notifications for a specific user as read

200.description: All notifications successfully marked as read

404.description: User not found

get.summary: Generates an OAuth URL for the user and redirects them
Syncs a QB OAuth session to our DB
get.description: The path where the QuickBooks OAuth server redirects to upon a completed (successful or not) OAuth connection

post.summary: Import quickbooks (invoice and purchase) data for a company, based off of the userId/user owner of the company
post.description: mport quickbooks (invoice and purchase) data for a company, based off of the userId/user owner of the company

400.description: Bad request, invalid user ID or inputs

401.description: Could not authenticate to QuickBooks session

404.description: QuickBooks data not found

post.summary: Bulk create or update new invoices
post.description: Creates new invoices according to the schema. If there is an invoice in the database with the same quickbooks_id, company_id pairing, then it will overwrite it's attributes

get.summary: Get invoice by id
get.description: Get invoice with matching ID from the database

404.description: No Invoice with given UUID found

get.summary: Get invoices for a company
get.description: Get invoices for a company with pagination params. Note page numbes are 0-indexed.

404.description: No Invoice with given UUID found

get.summary: Get the summation of invoices for a company in a date range
get.description: Get the summation of invoices for a company that were made after the start date and before the end date

get.summary: Get all line items for a given invoice
get.description: Get all line item for a given invoice

404.description: No Invoice Line Item with given UUID found

get.summary: Get the total invoice amounts broken down by months
get.description: Get the summation of invoices for a company that were made after the start date and before the end date split into each month that exists in the date range

post.summary: Bulk create or update new invoice line items
post.description: Creates new invoice line items according to the schema. If there is an invoice line item in the database with the same quickbooks_id, invoice_id pairing, then it will overwrite it's attributes

get.summary: Get invoice line item by id
get.description: Get invoice line item with matching ID from the database

404.description: No Invoice line item with given UUID found

post.summary: Create or update purchase line items
post.description: Creates new purchase line items or updates existing ones. If an id is provided in the payload, the line item will be updated; otherwise, a new line item will be created. Multiple line items can be created or updated in a single request.

200.description: Successfully created or updated purchase line items

400.description: Create or update purchase line items error

404.description: Purchase with the given purchaseId does not exist

500.description: Create or update purchase line items error

get.summary: Fetches a purchase line item by the given ID
get.description: Finds the purchase line item with the given ID in the database

200.description: Successfully fetched purchase line item from the database

404.description: There does not exist any purchase line item in the database with the given id

get.summary: Fetches all line items for a purchase by the given purchase ID
get.description: Finds all purchase line items associated with the given purchase ID in the database. Returns an empty array if the purchase exists but has no line items.

200.description: Successfully fetched all purchase line items for the given purchase from the database

400.description: Get purchase line items for purchase error

404.description: There does not exist any purchase in the database with the given id

500.description: Get purchase line items for purchase error

patch.summary: Updates a purchase line item's category
patch.description: Updates the category of the purchase line item with the given Id to the given category

200.description: Successfully updated the line item's category

patch.summary: Updates a purchase line item's type
patch.description: Updates the type of the purchase line item with the given Id to the given type

200.description: Successfully updated the line item's type

parameters.description: The ID of the self-reported disaster to update

post.summary: Creates data about the company's insurance policy
post.description: Can create many new entities with data about the company's insurance policy

500.description: Error Creating insurance policies in bulk

patch.summary: Update the given array of insurance policies

post.summary: Get presigned URL for document upload
post.description: Generates a presigned URL that allows direct upload to S3 from the client. The URL expires after 1 hour.

fileType.description: MIME type of the file (e.g., application/pdf, image/jpeg)

claimId.description: Optional claim ID for claim-specific documents

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters

post.summary: Confirm document upload completion
post.description: Verifies that a file was successfully uploaded to S3 and returns file details including a presigned download URL.

key.description: S3 key of the uploaded file

claimId.description: Optional claim ID for claim-specific documents

key.description: S3 key of the uploaded file

url.description: Presigned download URL for the file

isDuplicate.description: Whether this file is a duplicate

duplicateKey.description: Key of the original file if duplicate

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters

404.description: File not found in S3

get.summary: Get all documents of a specific type
get.description: Retrieves all documents of the specified type for a company or user.

400.description: Invalid request - missing or invalid parameters

delete.description: Deletes a document from both S3 storage and the database. This action cannot be undone.

200.description: Document deleted successfully from both S3 and database

400.description: Invalid request - missing key or documentId

500.description: Internal server error - failed to delete document

patch.description: Updates the category of a document

documentId.description: The database ID of the document

400.description: Invalid request - missing documentId or category
